description:
Fancy socks for discerning cyclists. A touch of padding soaks up vibration during long days backroad filled days in the saddle. When summer heat is in full swing, the breathable fabric keeps your feet from overheating.

  • Made of a moisture-wicking synthetic blend
  • Mesh cuffs and body breathe well and provide a great fit
  • Pads under the balls of your feet reduce vibration
  • No-feel toe seams for comfort and durability
  • Thin profile fits in close fitting cycling shoes
name: DeFeet Cyclismo 6 inch - Unisex
